title: The Zero RB Draft Strategy | The Dantasy Football Podcast
description:
As draft season approaches, we break down one of the hottest draft strategies in fantasy football: zero RB, also known as waiting to draft running backs until the middle rounds and loading up on wide receivers and tight ends early. We discuss the logic behind the strategy, and offer up the most valuable middle-to-late-round running backs.

Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Danny Kelly, and Craig Horlbeck
